page.title: 09LifeStyles Crosthwaite'area'
page.content: {The Damson Dene Cottage and Country {Club}is the largest of the three hotels. It lets 38 rooms with shower or bathroom,toilet and colour television.The dining room seats 80/120 who have a choice of{a la Carte {or Table d'Hote}menu. There is a large lounge bar with delightful views of the surrounding countryside and a separate public bar.{Bar Meals}are served from noon to 2 p.m.{The Country {Club}has a heated indoor swimming pool Spa bath, sauna, sunbeds, exercise bicycles and weights. There is a full sized snooker table. An outdoor swimming pool has an area for sunbathing. There is a Games Room for children with facilities for Pool, Table Tennis and Darts. It also has space invaders and a fruit machine. {The Damson Dene}caters for special functions such as weddings.
